name: fffrontend
description: This is the final group project. Our project is a Pet Adoption app that will allow users to browse a selection of pets that are in need of rescue.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd Client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../Client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd Client && npm run install && npm run build
